about_the_game:
Flip & Fit is a physics-based party game for 1-4 players. Pick up and play through the coop puzzle game show on a clock! Will you make it all the way to the show finale?


Uuuuh! Shiny colourful Tetris pieces. You should stack them! Super simple controls using the analog stick and just one button. Doesn’t get much more pick-up-and-play than that!


What’s that? Is that a... pink wall? It’s coming closer! Analyse the stage and figure out how to fit the pieces inside the silhouette. If you’re too slow you’ll be the laughing stock of the crowd. You have three shots though so make them count!


Flipping and fitting is better with a friend! You can gab each end of piece to flip easily or maybe one of you is holding the construction while the other just wedges the final piece before the impending pink wall passes its judgement upon you.


Just one more level! Play through the 2-player campaign. Each world introduces new blocks, mechanics and modifications that make the puzzles even more challenging! Will you reach the show finale?
